notes: They appeared in the [[Thais Raids#Primitive raid on Thais|raids of Primitives]]. These raids no longer exist as they were a special raid to celebrate [[Tibia's 10th Anniversary]].
sounds: There can only be one world!
Magic is only good for girls!
Uh, I can't hear anymore. I am deaf!
They've ruined it! I can't cheat anymore!
name: Primitive
behaviour: Runs in low [[hp|health]] and has a random selection order of attacks.
strategy: Use melee attacks or [[Force Strike]] and watch out for the fire bombs, especially in the raids where there are several of them.
